programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Australias longest running music TV show, rage is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres and eras. We curate the best clips of all time to surprise and entertain you for hours.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Costa meets the clivia king, Hannah visits a shady garden defying the odds, Sophie profiles flowers of the protea family, Clarence visits a First Nations owned and run nursery, and Millie gets started with winter jobs.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Joe OBrien.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: We look at how Beijing got its way over who could attend the Pacific Islands Forum. Plus how a landmark ICJ ruling could eventually see small island nations take legal action against big emitters like Australia.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ruby Cornish brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Piano
programme.desc: With one concert spot remaining, our everyday pianists are playing for the shoppers in the heart of Sydneys China Town.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News NSW brings you the days top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Nakari Thorpe, plus weather with Tom Saunders.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: Professor T befriends a vulnerable girl and is convinced she is the key witness to a murder. Dan and Lisa agree to go on a date. Her boss confronts her about their inappropriate relationship, Lisa makes a bold decision.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the days events, explaining whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: When a woman confesses to murdering her husband, the Lyell team must determine if all is as it seems. Meanwhile, Simone is shocked to be reunited with a detective from her childhood and struggles to untangle her past.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: Professor T befriends a vulnerable girl and is convinced she is the key witness to a murder. Dan and Lisa agree to go on a date. Her boss confronts her about their inappropriate relationship, Lisa makes a bold decision.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Myf Warhurst continues her van life odyssey in northern New South Wales and Western Australia. Setting out to discover when van life became a thing, she wonders if there comes a time when this nomadic life loses its appeal?

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Humphrey and the team face one of their strangest cases yet when a dead man is found in the centre of a crop circle. No-one knows who he is or how he got there. Conspiracy theorists suggest aliens are to blame.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Warioware: Move It! And Spawn Squad!
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: we get moving with the mini-game fuelled mayhem of WarioWare: Move It! Plus, Granny Gem shares her guide to game genres, and Logan joins the Spawn Squad!

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Codys friends become concerned when he forms a new friendship with a cactus.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: What if Marinette had no choice but to leave Paris on the day when Shadow Moth decided to create a new supervillain?

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Misplaced Mug
programme.desc: Mr McGillick is upset after he loses his precious Worlds Best Principal mug so Ezra makes it his personal mission to get it back.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Grab a Pickaxe, its Minecraft Mania!
programme.desc: Gem celebrates all things Minecraft with special guests the Fairbairn Brothers! Plus, theres a Creeper in The New Coach, a nasty surprise in Finding Player 2, and options for when youve mastered Minecraft Survival!

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak
programme.desc: Find out whats going on in the world with a news bulletin designed for children, featuring stories that are relevant and easy to understand.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This penultimate episode will determine which of our incredible fighting machines makes it into the grand final, along with the final two robots to compete in our Ten Robot Rumble.

programme.title: Officially Amazing
programme.desc: In this show we see a battle to jump into underpants, and another to wrap chips, meanwhile a contortionist battles her nerves.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: Showdown On King Kais World! Goku Vs Beerus The Destroyer!
programme.desc: Goku faces off against Beerus in a hard-hitting battle despite King Kais best efforts to keep them separate. But is Gokus strongest form enough to take on the God of Destruction?

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: We go on an adventure with the Heeler family in our review of Bluey: The Videogame! Plus, we speedrun our way through a review of the treacherous climbing of Jusant, and Mevin joins the Spawn Squad!

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: When the school switches to virtual reality, Harold uses the opportunity to get the respect he feels he rightfully deserves.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: As Guardian of the Miraculous, Ladybug must make difficult decisions which affect the people around her. But not everyone is ready to live in permanent hiding like her...

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Sad Little Sister
programme.desc: Poppy loses her school hat and is forced to sit in the shelter shed, where Maudie discovers there may be more to the missing hat.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Teenage Boss: Next Level
programme.desc: Keen sailor Abel is forced to navigate his way around a big hole in his budget as he strives to buy a new sailing jacket.

programme.title: Pokemon: Diamond And Pearl
programme.desc: When the elderly Abigails Pikachu goes missing, Ashs Pikachu reluctantly agrees to fill in until Abigails niece can locate the missing Pokemon.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!: Do Try This At Home
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand have brought their lab into Xands kitchen! In todays episode, the doctors look at eyes, and show you an experiment to find your blind spot!

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: The Ggsp 2023 Game Of The Year Awards
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: Its the end of the year so its time to hand out coveted Golden Rubber Chickens in our prestigious GGSP Game Of The Year Awards!

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: The funniest routines by renowned and up-and-coming comedians - bringing them to life in sketch form - featuring Russell Kane, Travis Jay, Chloe Petts, Olga Koch, Michael Stranney, Sikisa and Seann Walsh.

programme.title: Silverpoint
programme.desc: Having recruited Beas help, things dont go to plan for Dragonfly when Glen attempts to teleport himself through the energy source.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Tomoe Tsurugi (Kagami Tsurugis mother) gets akumatized into Ikari Gozen. Armed with her bokken, she wants to punish Kagami for disobeying her by locking her up forever in the giant armour that forms around her body.

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Missing Solar System
programme.desc: Pixie is horrified when her space diorama goes missing and Miss Tan falsely accuses her of not doing her homework.

programme.title: 100% Wolf: Legend Of The Moonstone
programme.desc: The Howlington kids enlist the help of Scarlet and her Granny to infiltrate the wolfhunter headquarters and retrieve the Doom Rock.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: P, E and N take on a pesky pen, who can draw anything it wants to escape them. This episode introduces the letter E and the words pen, peg and pet.

programme.title: Lets Sing!
programme.desc: Join Tim Minchin and The Sydney Childrens Choir and sing along to Tims song, When I Grow Up.

programme.title: Learn Mandarin
programme.desc: Join Harper as she learns about where in the world Chinese dialects are spoken and some basic greetings before she sets off on her trip to China.

programme.title: BTN Newsbreak
programme.desc: We find out about a new artwork by anonymous street artist Banksy, which has been erased just two days after going up.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Emma and Lee Fozard are in desperate need of Phils property expertise. A couple with three young boys, Emma and Lee have outgrown their current home. But is it good enough to put on the market in its current state?

programme.title: George Clarkes Old House New Home
programme.desc: Retired couple Charles and Ian Stringer are finally getting round to a complete redesign of their Edwardian home. Plus George tackles an 1850s country house which has had some very bizarre additions over the years.

programme.title: Game Night
programme.desc: Maxs brother arranges a murder mystery party for Game Night, with fake thugs and federal agents. With no rules, no points, and no idea who all the players are, this might be the most fun theyve ever had... or not.

programme.title: rage Vault Guest Programmer: Powderfinger
programme.desc: Marking the 25th anniversary of Powderfingers award winning album Odyssey Number Five, rage replays the bands 2000 guest program.

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: The team identify the body found in the chimney flue as forensics reveal the cause of death. Jess and Sunny visit the victims mother to break the devastating news. They find the pair had a tumultuous relationship.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Mum Martina and nan Peggy want to sell both their houses and move in together, but hes hampered by their brightly coloured decor. With two sets of sellers, is Secret Agent Spencer spreading himself too thin?

programme.title: Silverpoint
programme.desc: Louis confesses his real reason for being at the camp to the rest of the group, leading the four a step closer towards unlocking the alien rocks secrets.Â

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Ladybug faces Timetagger, a supervillain from the future.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: At the carnival Robby develops a crush on a new transfer student while his siblings get into trouble with the Fairmaestro. As sparks fly their sleeves unlock a new power!

programme.title: Do Not Watch This Show
programme.desc: Wizz just wants to go to sleep, but Mr Goblin has cursed him to stay awake... if you keep watching this episode!

programme.title: Pokemon: Diamond And Pearl
programme.desc: A Trainer named Mira offers to send our heroes straight to Hearthome City using her Abras Teleport move, but first she needs them to do her a favor...

programme.title: George Clarkes Old House New Home
programme.desc: Retired couple Charles and Ian Stringer are finally getting round to a complete redesign of their Edwardian home. Plus George tackles an 1850s country house which has had some very bizarre additions over the years.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Adam and Jamie return to discuss, dissect and delight in their first ever duct tape episode. Includes never before seen footage and behind-the-scenes insights from our legends of popular science.

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Some of the best loved stand-ups and a raft of the next generation of comedians, featuring Rhys James, Esther Manito, Travis Jay, Russell Kane, Sikisa, Josh Jones, Finlay Christie and Josh Weller.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.sub-title: Make Up Your Mind Upsy Daisy
programme.desc: Upsy Daisy is singing in the garden when the ball bounces along and comes to a rest beside her. Upsy Daisy cant make up her mind whether to sing or play with the ball.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector discovers starlings, and an amazing display of sound and movement.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing, Sula and Pando are SUPERHEROES in the park. Bing rescues Flop from the giant spider, but falls off the rope and Hoppity has an accident! Now they have to rescue Hoppity.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. Once the room is tidy Mummy says they can go back to their game. The room doesnt stay tidy for long. Peppas doll and Georges dinosaur are at the bottom of the toy box.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: PJ Masks Power Heroes
programme.desc: Newton feels unappreciated by his friends and decides to head off and explore solo but falls into the clutches of Gloop III.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better, including a dewdrop from a spiders web, slug slime and the burp of a frog.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George go to the park where they meet their friends, swing on the monkey bars, bounce on a bouncy branch and end with lots of muddy puddles.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Frizzy and Gemma investigate the mysterious disappearance of several boats in Kangaroo Beachs Barramundi Triangle.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Cleo prepares her friends for the preschool potluck by teaching them manners in a game. Nervous but determined, the Super Monsters impress Cleos mom with their kindness and teamwork.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanleys friends throw a surprise birthday party for him. No working for Stan today. Cynthia and Jose spring into action when Amare calls and rush to help.

programme.title: Mini Kids
programme.desc: The toddlers are visited by a rat. Fantus helps a little toucan find its parent.

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Abby and Rudy join in on a game of pickleball. Rudy feels frustrated when hes the only one who struggles to get the ball over the net.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: B, O and X discover a box filled with everything they need to put on a performance of Sleeping Beauty. This episode has fun with lots of letters - and the words box, hag, red, ted and bed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig have been growing strawberries to make jam but when they discover that the birds have eaten them all, they go to a strawberry farm.

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Gingers baby Broccolisaurus friend kicks their ball into Potatodon territory. Now they have challenge the Potatodons to a game to win it back.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: When Popcorn runs on his hamster wheel all night, hes cranky the next day. But will he nap?

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stan helps his friends to get a closer look at the moon through a telescope.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: When Newton turns his back on his space powers, Luna exploits him to get back to the moon.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Frizzy and Gemma investigate the mysterious disappearance of several boats in Kangaroo Beachs Barramundi Triangle.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas helps his friend Ace overcome his fear of animals so that he can compete in the Super Stunt Rally.

programme.title: Reef School
programme.desc: When Oli the octopus wins a game of hide and seek, shes awarded a special prize; the chance to learn expert hiding skills from the reefs Master of Disguise.Â

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds meet a bee and follow it home to its hive! They watch bees collect nectar, make honey, protect the hive, and care for babies - all in their buzzing bee kingdom.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Judo wants to play in the dirt with Bluey and Bingo, but shes not supposed to get dirty!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and friends visit a Petting Farm where they enjoy feeding chickens and meeting cute and squeaky guinea pigs and they all learn its important to wash your hands after handling the little animals.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Mojo and Bo cant let Dot see her birthday present early, but Dot cant be stopped!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: An earthquake in Alaska causes tremors that travel all the way to the Nevada Desert, causing big trouble in a pool of water that a group of tiny pupfish call home.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: The Heelers and Luckys family get together to watch the big game!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a little worm who has swallowed a bit too much earth and has got the hiccups.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Chilli decides to become a superhero called Super Chilli! His superhero skills are put to the test when Evil Pea covers Supertato in sticky honey, but Chillis heat saves the day.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: On a trip to the Dump Dad claims hes the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dads throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: Makka Pakka is washing the ball when his Uff-uff blows right away. It falls into Upsy Daisys bed.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: When Mole is scared by a dog, the Sound Collector discovers they have something in common.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Coco are reading Charlie "Biteysaurus Big Book Of Dinosaurs", but Coco brings the Rainbow Fairy Mice into it. Bing is frustrated! Flop shows Bing how to mix them together to make a new story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are at the playground. Peppa loves to play on the swings but George doesnt like to be pushed too high. Peppa gets stuck in the tyre on the climbing frame and Daddy Pig gets stuck on the slide.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington, Jonathan and Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need afront page story!

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: For an entire day the Kingdom has to make do without help from magic.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Jewels visits and copies everything Ariel does. Sebastian tries to relax for a day.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: The Super Monsters use teamwork and magic to make a seed bloom and help Lobo sing despite the Blue Moon, proving that together, they can achieve the impossible.

programme.title: Fizzy And Suds
programme.desc: Fizzy and Suds meet the penguins! See them snuggle, waddle, nap, and slide. From gentoo to king penguins, its a chilly, splashy, fishy adventure full of fun.

programme.title: Zog And The Flying Doctors
programme.desc: Zog, Pearl and Gadabout are now a flying doctor trio, caring for all kinds of creatures. When bad weather forces them to land at the palace, Pearl is locked up by her uncle, the King, so Zog and Gadabout try to set her free.

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Cookie Monster feels nervous about going to cooking school for the first time. Rosita shows him how to do a heart breath to help him feel better, but hes still not ready yet.

programme.title: Mecha Builders Shorts
programme.desc: Its Earth Day, and Berta organized a trash clean-up. But Ranger Nat forgot to bring gloves for everyone, and you cant touch trash without gloves!

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Declan is frustrated when Lu has the same favourite thing as him.

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Tish and her friends are disappointed to find the playground closed for construction. Unsure what to do next, the gang climb the sand dunes, looking for the desert oasis.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: When Sunny meets his new baby sister, hes disappointed that shes too little to play.

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Theres a funny noise around town keeping people up. Stanley and Myrtle investigate.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Romeo resents the PJs new animal powers, so he invents some robotic animal "powers" of his own.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: When Pounce falls in the lagoon and gets covered in seaweed, the other cadets mistake him for a swamp monster, and decide they have to capture it.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Sonny is trying to prove himself to be a useful engine so that he can stay working on Sodor, but nobody seems to trust him... nobody apart from Diesel, that is! But can Diesel be trusted?

programme.title: Peppa Pig: Around The World With Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa and her family set off to the park to celebrate the beginning of the summer holidays. But when their car breaks down and Miss Rabbit lends them her plane for the day, they get swept off on an adventure all around the world.

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: When Miles loses his Rowdy Robot toy during a trip to the park, its up to Millie to find it!

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Costa and the kids build a frog bog from an upcycled sink with hidey holes for the frogs and surround it with plants. We check back to see if the frogs come.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George go behind the scenes to find out how TV is made. Miss Rabbit shows them around the set of Super Potato.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale Of Cottontails New Friend
programme.desc: When Cottontail leaves the burrow in search of her new playmate, the Shrew, Peter must scour the woods and find his sister before a hungry Old Brown does.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo build a very special cubby for their stuffed toy Kimjim.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar give Winnie the rhino a mud bath. They then hold some hissing cockroaches and reveal how such a small animal has something in common with the huge rhino!

programme.desc: Know the latest on the days top stories, as Michael Tetlow brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, our shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Patricia Karvelas asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.title: ABC News Hour

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Fallout from the assassination of Charlie Kirk: Who was he and what did he stand for? Plus Trumps use of "emergency laws" and billions earmarked for NASAs Artemis project to accelerate exploration of the Moon and Mars.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats happening in our world. Manny Tsigas presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: The home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the big stories from across Australia and around the globe. The ABCs network of reporters cover important stories and all the news you need. Presented by Manny Tsigas.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. Weve got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan, James Glenday, Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne hear from some of the guests who have appeared on News Breakfast. Plus our film critic Zak Hepburn and resident foodie Alice Zaslavsky.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Fallout from the assassination of Charlie Kirk: Who was he and what did he stand for? Plus Trumps use of "emergency laws" and billions earmarked for NASAs Artemis project to accelerate exploration of the Moon and Mars.

programme.title: Close Of Business
programme.desc: Alicia Barry presents a weekly roundup of business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and overseas markets, analysing whats going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: DW Focus On Europe
programme.desc: Italys Carlo Acutis is viewed as an internet saint: he used digital media to share his faith online. Plus thousands of university students in the Netherlands search for accommodation, which is expensive and in short supply.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats happening in our world. Manny Tsigas presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: We look at whats behind South Australias algal bloom outbreak, whats being done to fix it, and how future outbreaks can be prevented.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Ahead of the Pacific Islands Forum, we look at how Beijing got its way over who could attend. Plus how a landmark ICJ ruling could eventually see small island nations take legal action against big emitters like Australia.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Thomas Oriti bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: Take a closer look at whats making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about whats really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Not Stupid
programme.sub-title: Will a shark net save you?
programme.desc: Julia Baird and guest co-host Darren Saunders chat about sharks, shark nets and spending time in the water. Plus there have been plenty of funding cuts and issues lately, so whats really going on with our universities?

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: Ruby Cornish presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: ABC Evening News
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australias best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Mariam Saab brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend
programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you the days events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the days top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of whats happening as it unfolds.
